games.name: The Witness
games.description: You wake up, alone, on a strange island full of puzzles that will challenge and surprise you. The Witness is a single-player game in a beautiful open world with dozens of locations to explore and over 500 puzzles. This game respects you as an intelligent player and it treats your time as precious.

games.name: Subnautica
games.description: Descend into the depths of an alien underwater world filled with wonder and peril. Craft equipment, pilot submarines, terraform voxel terrain, and outsmart wildlife to explore lush coral reefs, volcanoes, cave systems, and more - all while trying to survive.

games.name: ABZÛ
games.description: From the art director of Journey, ABZÛ is a beautiful underwater adventure that evokes the dream of diving. Immerse yourself in a vibrant ocean world full of mystery and bursting with color and life. Perform fluid acrobatics, discover hundreds of unique species, and form a powerful connection with the abundant sea life.
